August 12, 196l|
Mr, William G, Harley
President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
13^6 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D, C,
Dear Mr, Parley:
My associates with the Bingham Associates Fund and I
would like information concerning application for membership
in the NAEB. At a meeting of the Council on Medical Television
in Atlanta this spring, information about the NAEB was available,
but we seem to be missing this from our files. Any general
information you would like to include would also be appreciated,
n a
I understand that the NAEB is holding its annual meeting
[-in October, We would also appreciate having material concerning
the meeting. Having been in etv for a number of years, and now
in the field of medical communications, I might like to consider
^attending
Thank you very much.
Sincerely yours.
